column5: This is my natural cover scent for my hunting outfit for deer hunting. Can you amagin the first thought of a cop if I got pulled over.Whats in the bag mister?Then he takes a second look.LOL  Seriously though,it,s works great. I put a fresh layer of ceder branches on the bottom of my hunting bag,then put my suit and gear in the bag,then add more on top. I refresh it once a week. No artificial spaying or washing crap. Hope it helps ya out.
That's an old trick that everybody should use.  For oiling a firearm, I buy natural oil (cedar, spruce, etc) extract that is sold in drugstores.  It's great for oiling the outside of a firearm.
Great minds think alike !!!   Thats what I do also
And you can just cut it right off the neighbors hedge

Thats what I do.LOL NOT. I cut the local stuff where I hunt. I know guys that use that ginny pig stuff.(tried it once,itches like crazy and gets in yer crack)   Thanks for the tip Dab.   I dont know about great minds. I just thought it was the best thing to do.
i do the same too works great
Save even more money... go fishing 12 months a year!!!   ... no guns, ammo, or sissy ass hunting crap to buy!!!
Ya always make me laugh Glen. Now go and give the mrs,s the toung will ya. It works everytime.
What What What???... but, but, but, then she'll want to molest me!!!  ... I'm skeered now!!!
